name: flare.Community Health.Public Health
description: Aims to protect and promote health through hospital funding, housing programs, mental health investment, and more.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Asian Art Museum
description: The museum celebrates, preserves, and promotes Asian and Asian American art and cultures.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Arts Commission
description: The Commission champions the arts, invests in local artists, enlivens the urban environment, and shapes innovative cultural policy.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Fine Arts Museum
description: Aims to connect visitors with art to stimulate creativity and share knowledge and ideas.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Public Library
description: Provides free and equal access to books and digital services throughout the city.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Law Library
description: Provides free legal information resources and services to help residents understand the law and protect their legal rights.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Recreation & Park Commission
description: Provides the city's parks, playgrounds, and open spaces, as well as "enriching recreational activities."

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.Academy of Sciences
description: A science museum — and scientific and educational institution — located in San Francisco's Golden Gate Park.

name: flare.Culture & Recreation.War Memorial
description: The War Memorial and Performing Arts Center operates venues for culture, education, and entertainment.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.GSA - City Administrator
description: A broad array of departments, divisions, programs, and offices reporting to the Office of the City Administrator.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Assessor - Recorder
description: Aims to identify and assess all taxable property in the city, collect transfer tax, and record and provide access to records.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Board of Supervisors
description: The legislative branch of San Francisco’s government. It adopts legislation, establishes policies, and assists constituents.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.City Attorney
description: Provides legal services to the Mayor’s Office, the Board of Supervisors, elected City officials, and all the city’s departments, boards, and commissions.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Controller
description: Aims to ensure the City’s financial integrity through audits and oversight, promoting effective and accountable government.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.City Planning
description: Aims to guide and regulate land use, urban design, and development to make San Francisco the world’s most livable urban place.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Civil Service Commission
description: Aims to make sure the city employs the best-qualified candidates for public service in a timely and efficient manner.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.GSA - Technology
description: A broad array of departments, divisions, programs, and offices with the aim of improving city tech.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Ethics Commission
description: Investigates and punishes wrongdoing in the city, and collects and reports electoral data.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Human Resources
description: Aims to use equitable practices to hire, develop, support, and retain a highly-qualified workforce.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Health Service System
description: Aims to preserve and improve health benefits and to enhance the well-being of employees, retirees, and their families.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Mayor
description: The executive branch of San Francisco's government. Has a broad remit for enacting programs and setting policy direction.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Elections
description: Aims to provide equitable access to election services and voting, and to conduct free and fair elections.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Retirement System
description: Works to secure and prudently invest the city's pension trust accounts and provide promised benefits.

name: flare.General Administration & Finance.Treasurer-Tax Collector
description: The banker, tax collector, collection agent, and investment officer for the city.

name: flare.General City Responsibilities.General City - Unallocated
description: General City Responsibility Expenditures not directly attributable to one City department, such as reserve deposits and debt service.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Children, Youth & Families
description: Aims to improve the city for children by investing in youth and their families.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Child Support Services
description: Aims to ensure the financial support and well-being of children through child support orders and non-cash alternatives.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Dept of Early Childhood
description: Helps parents and guardians with child care, parenting support, and child development.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Environment
description: Provides support for urban agriculture, forestry, green buildings, and other environmental projects.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Homelessness Services
description: Aims to make homelessness rare, brief, and one-time through services like housing and mental health support.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Human Rights Commission
description: Advocates for human and civil rights, and uses anti-discrimination laws to further racial solidarity and equity.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Human Services Agency
description: Delivers services to support communities including food distribution, children's programs, and a disability community center.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Rent Arbitration Board
description: Aims to protect tenants from excessive rent increases and unjust evictions, while assuring landlords fair rents.

name: flare.Human Welfare & Neighborhood Development.Status of Women
description: Aims to make the city fully gender equitable through policies, programs, and legislation.

name: flare.Public Protection.Adult Probation
description: Aims to rehabilitate adult offenders to promote community safety and reduce recidivism.

name: flare.Public Protection.Superior Court
description: Aims to assure equal access, fair treatment, and the just and efficient resolution of disputes for all people asserting their rights under the law in the city.

name: flare.Public Protection.District Attorney
description: Aims to prosecute suspects, support victims of crime, and develop alternatives to incarceration.

name: flare.Public Protection.Emergency Management
description: Leads in planning, preparedness, communication, response, and recovery for daily emergencies, citywide events, and major disasters.

name: flare.Public Protection.Police Accountabilty
description: Aims to hold the police accountable to civilian oversight through investigations, policy recommendations, and performance audits.

name: flare.Public Protection.Fire Department
description: Aims to protect lives and property from fires, natural disasters, accidents, hazardous materials incidents, and other causes.

name: flare.Public Protection.Juvenile Probation
description: Aims to rehabilitate young offenders by providing supervision, support, and resources.

name: flare.Public Protection.Public Defender
description: Offers free legal representation and advocates for systemic changes to benefit the disenfranchised and disempowered.

name: flare.Public Protection.Police
description: Aims to prevent and investigate crimes, ensure public safety, and maintain respect for all.

name: flare.Public Protection.Office of Sheriff's Inspector General
description: Provides independent civilian oversight of the Sheriff's Office.

name: flare.Public Protection.Sheriff
description: Operates jails and alternative sentencing programs, guards courthouses, and executes warrants.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Airport Commission
description: SFO is the Bay Area’s largest airport by passenger volume. The Commission sets its policies.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Board of Appeals
description: Provides a final administrative review process for appeals on a range of City determinations.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Building Inspection
description: Oversees the enforcement of various building codes and Disability Access Regulations.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Public Works
description: Builds and maintains city infrastructure, such as streets and sidewalks.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Office of Economic and Workforce Development
description: Aims to support sustainable jobs and businesses using grants, work training, and more.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Municipal Transportation Agency
description: Aims to make transit and other sustainable modes of travel safe, affordable, and attractive.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Port
description: Aims to advance sustainable maritime, recreational, and economic opportunities via the port.

name: flare.Public Works, Transportation & Commerce.Public Utilities Commission
description: Provides reliable water, power, and wastewater services to the city.
